actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill relating to collective bargaining representation of postal employees.

summary.text: Provides that no procedures established pursuant to the collective bargaining agreements between postal workers and the Postal Service shall preclude employees from being represented in grievance and adverse actions arising under the agreement by representatives of their own choosing.

titles.title: A bill relating to collective bargaining representation of postal employees.
